metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
Instructions:: o  Arrange meats, cheeses, olives, and vegetables on a platter. 
o  Serve with breadsticks. Arancini 
• Ingredients:

Ingredients:: o  Assorted cured meats (salami, prosciutto) 
o  Cheeses (mozzarella, provolone) 
o  Olives 
o  Marinated vegetables (artichokes, peppers) 
o  Breadsticks • Instructions:

Ingredients:: o  4 corn tortillas 
o  1 tablespoon vegetable oil 
o  1 small onion 
o  2 cloves garlic 
o  4 cups chicken broth 
o  2 tomatoes 
o  1 teaspoon cumin 
o  1 avocado 
o  1/4 cup cilantro • Instructions:

Ingredients:: o  1 cup rice flour 
o  1/2 cup coconut milk 
o  1/2 cup water 
o  1/2 pound shrimp 
o  1/2 pound pork 
o  1 small onion 
o  1/2 cup bean sprouts 
o  1/4 cup green onions 
o  1/4 cup cilantro 
o  1 teaspoon turmeric

Ingredients:: o  2 cups rice 
o  1 small onion 
o  2 cloves garlic 
o  4 tomatoes 
o  1/4 cup tomato paste 
o  1/4 cup vegetable oil 
o  1 teaspoon thyme 
o  1 teaspoon curry powder 
o  1 teaspoon salt 
o  1/2 teaspoon pepper 
o  4 cups chicken broth • Instructions:

Instructions:: In a bowl, combine the chicken, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, celery, and grapes. • 
•  Season with salt and pepper. 
•  Serve in lettuce leaves. Veggie and Hummus Wrap 
Ingredients:

Ingredients:: o  4 tomatoes 
o  1 cucumber 
o  1 small red onion 
o  1/4 cup olives 
o  1/4 cup green beans 
o  2 hard-boiled eggs 
o  1 can tuna 
o  1/4 cup olive oil 
o  2 tablespoons red wine vinegar 
o  1 teaspoon Dijon mustard 
o  1 teaspoon salt • Instructions:
